QuestData.Title: Stasis Chambers of Bash'ir
QuestData.Description: The Ethereum have a settlement on the northernmost shelf of Blade's Edge Mountains known as Bash'ir's Landing. According to the key tablet, much larger versions of the prisons are kept at Bash'ir's. It should also be noted that the Ethereum refer to those prisons as stasis chambers.$B$BThe key tablet grants access to a very specific stasis chamber at the landing known as Stasis Chamber Alpha. Take the key and investigate.$B$BMy image will be awaiting your return at Bash'ir's Landing. Speak to me there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ethereum Key Tablet - Alpha to open Stasis Chamber Alpha at Bash'ir's Landing in Blade's Edge Mountains.$B$BReturn Evidence from Alpha to the Image of Commander Ameer at Bash'ir's Landing.
QuestData.RewardText: <The image of Commander Ameer rummages through the evidence.>$B$BIt is worse than I thought... These chambers hold ferocious beasts and creatures from many, many different worlds. They hope to one day command the beasts to do their bidding. We must destroy them all!
